動物用藥品名稱: 雅碧雞家禽霍亂不活化菌苗
效能(適應症): 雞、火雞及水禽：預防家禽霍亂。
ingredients: WATER PHASE CONTAINING INACTIVATED PASTEURELLA MULTOCIDA(STRAIN X-73, SEROTYPE 1  2.5*10^9CFUSTRAIN P-1059, SEROTYPE 3  2.5*10^9CFUSTRAIN P-1662, SEROTYPE 4  0.7*10^9CFU).......30%MONTAN 80.........1 %          MONTANOX 80 .....3%MINERAL OIL, USP......66%THIMEROSAL (AS A PRESERVATIVE).....0.01%不活化家禽霍亂力價每毫升函每株至少 5*10^9菌數
